title: Numerical Linear Algebra
description: Introduction to the numerical solution of the classic problems of linear algebra including linear systems, least squares, Singular value decomposition, eigenvalue problems. Crosslisted with CSE 6643.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 2406 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 4305 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
